values: People who feel proud are happy about what they have done.
She is proud of the picture she drew of her house.
adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的
adj. 有自尊心的自豪的, 得意的骄傲的, 傲慢的, 妄自尊大的比较级:prouder, proudest副 词:proudly

a. (of)自豪的；引以自豪的；妄自尊大的
a. (of)自豪的；引以自豪的；妄自尊大的
自豪, 骄傲, 引以为傲, 值得骄傲 (adj.)
adj. 自豪的，得意的，骄傲的，妄自尊大的；<衍生词> proudly  adv.骄傲地
adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的
Proud refers to something that gives a sense of satisfaction or achievement, or is characterized by dignity or self-respect.
